name: Now VirtualAgent Australia SPP
longDescription: The Now Virtual Agent for SPP allows you to perform routine ServiceNow tasks directly in Microsoft Teams, so you can work more efficiently using chat. With Now Virtual Agent for SPP you can execute routine ServiceNow actions via chat, exchange data seamlessly with your existing ServiceNow apps, find answers to frequently asked questions, and resolve common IT requests and HR tasks across your ServiceNow cloud services. Please note that users must have an active ServiceNow account with virtual agent capabilities to use this application in Microsoft Teams. Please ask your tenant admin to configure the app. Please follow the signup [link](https://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:VirtualAgent-Teams-Linkage&version=master). **This app is available only for Australia region users.**
shortDescription: Find answers, file requests and complete routine ServiceNow tasks within chat.

examplePrompts.prompt: @Now VirtualAgent Australia SPP Can you help me find the status of the incident ticket INC123456?
examplePrompts.description: The user is asking the bot to check the status of a specific incident ticket.

examplePrompts.prompt: @Now VirtualAgent Australia SPP I need to submit a request for a new software installation.
examplePrompts.description: The user wants to file a request for a new software installation.

examplePrompts.prompt: @Now VirtualAgent Australia SPP Please assist me in closing the resolved task TSK987654.
examplePrompts.description: The user is asking for assistance in completing the routine task of closing a resolved task.
